document_name: MDGF 1656 JP Strengthening the Phil Insti Capacity to Adapt to Climate Change Project Document.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/PHL/00056538/MDGF 1656 JP Strengthening the Phil Insti Capacity to Adapt to Climate Change Project Document.pdf

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: This project will achieve: (1) base line risk scenarios, including vulnerability maps and Climate risk reduction (CRR)/adaptation monitoring system developed for priority sectors; (2) adaptation options for key sectors assessed,  valued & least cost alternatives prioritized, including ' no regrets' options: (3) entry points for CRR in key national plans/planning & regulatory(e.g. EIA) process & CCA/UNDAF, identified and prioritized CCA adaptation best practices recommended for integration; (4) CRR mainstreaming guidelines adopted by key national government agencies and selected local governments;  (5) Selected local development / comprehensive land use plans reflect CRR measures; (6) existing capacities and gaps of key NGAs, selected LGUs and local HEIs for CRR work assessed; (7) awareness of key national & local stakeholders raised on climate change issues; (8) CRR planning& implementation competencies of key stakeholders enhanced/ increased; (9) enhanced capacities of local stakeholders through demonstration projects on the best practices to improve local coping mechanisms, including alternativelivelihoods.

project_descr: Strengthening the Philippines' Institutional Capacity to Adapt to Climate Change
project_title: MDG-1656 Strengthen Philippines' Capacity to Adapt to CC
